name: Cavern Escape (itch)
description:
Your torch has gone out and all you have left is a pocket full of pebbles.  You must escape the cavern using only your ears.  Beware, many dangers lurk in the dark.

Use directional keys to move the explorer. Use your mouse and click on surrounding tiles to throw a pebble and listen for a way out.

Credits:

Code / Art - Jeff Adams (atomic)

Sound Effects - FreeSound.org

Jaylew1987 LittleRobotSoundFactory HermanDV Selulance DJmastah kwahmah_02 Tdude9000

This is my first game and as such it is very unfinished.  There is only one map but thanks to some design ideas from TwinGhosts I can very easily create more and implement them. There are no "lives" or timer, so there's no pressure but it definitely fits the theme of "Exploration".  I hope you enjoy!
